V podstate úplne čokoľvek! A presne o to v medzičasom už kultovej zábavnej šou Partička ide - nenechať sa zaskočiť hocako absurdne znejúcim zadaním diabolského moderátora Dana Dangla a na veľkú radosť divákov v štúdiu i pred obrazovkami improvizovať ako o život! To, že ide o kráľovsky zábavný test invenčnosti a talentu všetkých zúčastnených, ale aj poriadny záber na ich nervy, napnuté na prasknutie, hádam ani netreba zvlášť zdôrazňovať. Nik si totiž nemôže byť istý tým, čo sa stane a ako celý večer dopadne, ani len oni sami nie!

programme.title: Rodinné prípady
programme.sub-title: Seriál SR
programme.desc: Stratený: Manželia Dušan a Júlia sú vo zväzku druhý raz - ich prvé vzťahy poznačili nešťastné udalosti. Dušanova prvá manželka tragicky zahynula a zanechala mu malého syna. Júliin manžel záhadne zmizol ešte pred narodením dcéry. Jedného dňa však niekto z minulosti nečakane zasiahne do ich životov...

programme.title: Tvoja tvár znie povedome
programme.desc: Veľkolepá zábavná šou plná fenomenálnych premien, skvelých hudobných čísel a obľúbených slovenských hviezd v roliach svetových, ale aj domácich ikon populárnej hudby, je na konci. V siedmej sérii sa divákom opäť predstavila skvelá osmička osobností slovenského šoubiznisu. Svoje herecké, spevácke a tanečné schopnosti, ale v neposlednom rade aj zmysel pre humor, predviedli obľúbené herečky z markizáckych seriálových hitov – Viki Ráková zo Susedov, Lívia Bielovič z Druhej šance a Natália Puklušová z Oteckov, ktoré doplnila populárna stand-up komička Simona Salátová. Mužskú štvoricu súťažiacich tvoril víťaz ostatnej SuperStar Adam Pavlovčin, známy hudobník a famózny huslista Ondrej Kandráč, talentovaný herec a spevák Matúš Kolárovský, ktorý sa dostal do povedomia divákov v úspešnom seriáli Pán profesor, a napokon ďalší mladý herec Karol Tóth, ktorého diváci spoznali aj ako lekára v druhej sérii obľúbeného seriálu Druhá šanca. Na súťažiacich sa aj vo finále pozrie a ich výkony bude hodnotiť herečka Zuzana Kubovčíková Šebová, spevák kapely Desmod Mário „Kuly“ Kollár, hudobník Marián Čekovský a bojovník MMA Attila Végh. Moderuje Martin Nikodým.

programme.title: 2 na 1
programme.desc: V dnešnej časti si Adela s Danom vezmú „na paškál“ speváčku Daru Rolins. Zábavná relácia, v ktorej si dvaja moderátori - Adela Vinczeová a Dano Dangl - „podajú“ vždy jedného zaujímavého hosťa. Ten bude musieť absolvovať sériu rôznych úloh, skúšok alebo výziev, ktoré ho dostanú do neštandardných a nie celkom komfortných situácií. Diváci sa môžu tešiť na vtipné momenty a reakcie, ktoré vzniknú pod vplyvom nečakaných udalostí.

programme.title: Susedia
programme.sub-title: Komediálny seriál SR (2018).
programme.desc: Zásnuby: Marekovi rodičia chcú prísť na návštevu, ale Marek o nich nepovie Zuzane a Františkovi všetko. Milka im oznámi, že chcú hovoriť o kúpe bytu pre "mladých", ale vtom ich vyruší László. Zistil, že Ildikó má stretnutie s riaditeľom v kostýmoch Snehulienky a Batmana. Marek sa pokúsi odkázať dôležitú informáciu o rodičoch cez Lászla. László je urazený, lebo by rád aj s Ildi prišiel na oslavu, ale nie sú pozvaní. László teda Františkovi povie úplný opak toho čo je pravda. Navyše od rána silno prší. Ako to celé dopadne, keď sa do toho zapojí ešte aj poštár a Zuzanin architekt?

programme.title: Susedia
programme.sub-title: Komediálny seriál SR (2018).
programme.desc: Halloween 2018: Zuzana sa chystá na tematickú párty a musí tam s ňou ísť aj František. Ten však má dohodnutú návštevu cintorína s rodičmi. László a Ildikó sú tiež vychystaní "na dušičky", ale oblečením pripomínajú seriálové postavy. Keďže Marek nabúral Zuzanine auto musí ich odviezť Ildikó. Na párty tak pôjdu všetci, s krátkou zastávkou na cintoríne. Milka sa necíti dobre. Marek je presvedčený, že začína rodiť. Andrejka volá kamaráta záchranára, hoci Sladká to vraj zvládne aj doma. Domov sa ponáhľajú aj Fero, Zuzana, László a Ildikó, lenže auto neštartuje. Stihnú prísť včas? Ako zareaguje Ildikó na Andrejkinho priateľa záchranára? Dozvie sa mamička, že František miesto ich stretnutia na hroboch išiel v maske na párty?

programme.title: Susedia
programme.sub-title: Komediálny seriál SR (2018).
programme.desc: Pôrod: Ildikó aj Zuzana vyhrali vianočné wellness pobyty. Chlapom sa to nepáči, chcú tradičné Vianoce, kým sa však hádajú kde, kto a s kým bude tráviť Vianoce, Milka začína rodiť a treba ju rýchlo zaviezť do nemocnice. Pojazdné auto má iba Ildikó, ktorá je na svoje auto veľmi citlivá. László si na upokojenie nalial "barackpálenku" a František 3 pivá. Marek síce nepil, ale zo stresu omdlieva. Nájde sa rýchly šofér a stihnú zaviezť Milku do pôrodnice?

programme.title: Susedia
programme.sub-title: Komediálny seriál SR (2018).
programme.desc: Zas je niekto tehotný?: Zuzana na sebe pozoruje symptómy tehotenstva. František je sprvu zdesený, ale nakoniec sa z toho teší. K Ildikó sa dostala informácia, že ju László podvádza s kolegyňou Farkašovou z Lesnej správy. László chce byť krstným otcom Milkinho dieťaťa a kúpi retiazku so srdiečkom a písmenkom E. Kedže Farkašová aj dieťa majú rovnakú iniciálu krstného mena, László bude mať čo vysvetľovať. Presvedčí Ildikó, že je jej verný? Ako zareaguje Farkašová? Potvrdí gynekológ Zuzanino tehotenstvo?

programme.title: Horná Dolná
programme.sub-title: Pápež. Komediálny seriál SR (2021).
programme.desc: Farár v snahe upevniť postavenie cirkvi v dedine napíše list do Vatikánu. List dá na starosť Sojkovi. A Sojka si to vysvetlí po svojom…

programme.title: Horná Dolná
programme.sub-title: Veľká noc. Komediálny seriál SR (2021).
programme.desc: Opäť je tu Veľká noc a ženy majú podozrenie, že ich zase čaká masaker. A hoci muži prisahajú, že nemajú žiadne zlé úmysly, ženy sa pripravujú na boj…

programme.title: Smotánka
programme.sub-title: Nevšedný svet kľúčovou dierkou
programme.desc: Spoločenské akcie, honosné večierky a zábavné párty - miesta, kde sa bežný smrteľník len tak ľahko nedostane, ale s našou kamerou je možné nahliadnuť na miesta, kde to vrie zábavou, nádhernými róbami a známymi tvárami. Najaktuálnejšie dianie v spoločenskom živote, svet recepcií a večierkov, exkluzívne rozhovory s celebritami a tie najnovšie pikošky - vyberte sa so Smotánkou do prostredia „horných desaťtisíc"! Relácia, v ktorej vás svetom smotánky sprevádza šarmantná moderátorka Erika Judínyová.

programme.title: Susedia
programme.sub-title: Komediálny seriál SR (2020).
programme.desc: Policajná akadémia II.: László tesne pred skúškami na mestského policajta trénuje s Františkom streľbu a kondičku. Ildikó chce oslavovať s Gergelym jeho narodeniny. Ten však má iné plány a indície nasvedčujú, že medzi ním a Milkou to divoko iskrí. František popri tréningu vyzerá pani Jarmilku, aby jej všetko vysvetlil a nebol za chrapúňa. László pri streľbe zo vzduchovky síce netrafí terč, ale predsa trafí presne a odhalí malé tajomstvo… František sa v depresii z toho opíja v bývalej reštaurácii, kde Marta organizuje špeciálny indický čajový dejchánek. Zuzana s Andrejkou by tu v tom istom čase chceli nakrúcať svoj telešoping. Medzi Martou a Zuzanou vzniká zásadný konflikt. Bufetár upozorní susedov na podozrivé indivíduá, ktoré po súmraku chodia do parku. Vyzerá to na tajné stretnutia Gergelyho a Milky a to treba preveriť! Žiaľ, manželky chlapom zatrhnú tajnú akciu a tak László zapojí kolegov z polície. Čo odhalí razia v parku? A ako dopadne František, keď ho Zuzana donúti vybaviť jej priestor na nakrúcanie telešopingu "chlapským spôsobom"?

programme.title: Susedia
programme.sub-title: Komediálny seriál SR (2020).
programme.desc: Úchyl: Zuzana musela nastúpiť do "normálnej" práce a je z toho na nervy. František opäť raňajkuje hot-dog v parku a vidí Milku s Gergelym ako sa bozkávajú na lavičke. Musí získať dôkaz! Zásluhy Lászlovi predsa len vybavili uniformu v zrýchlenom termíne a Ildikó by veľmi rada využila jej afrodiziakálne účinky. Lászlo je však odvolaný do akcie, nejaký úchyl si v parku fotí milencov. František sa dozvie, že šéfka je PN. Nemusí ísť do práce a ostáva hrať v parku mariáš. Ildikó trápi, či sa náhodou Gergely s Milkou nezačali veľmi zbližovať. Zúfalá Zuzana by chcela opäť začať podnikať samostatne. Andrejka jej vnukne nápad; rozhodla sa dať si zmenšiť prsia. Chce to utajiť pred Lászlom a Františkom, aby jej to nemohli vyhovoriť. Prečo sa objaví Farkašová v parčíku? Podarí sa Františkovi pred ňou schovať? Akú oslavu "novej uniformy" chce robiť Ildikó? Podarí sa utajiť pred ženami ako sa vyvíja vzťah Milky a Gergelyho?

programme.title: Susedia
programme.sub-title: Komediálny seriál SR (2020).
programme.desc: Hot-Dog: Zuzana čaká večer dôležitú návštevu - chce si polepšiť v robote a tak pozvala svojho šéfa. Od Františka sa očakáva, že neurobí žiaden prúser, najlepšie, aby ani nebol doma. Susedia sa dohodli, že tohto roku Veľkú noc oslavovať nebudú. Len František musí na Lesnej správe vyšibať svoju šéfku Farkašovú. Lászlo je v strese, lebo zatajuje pred Ildikó, že medzi Gergelym a Milkou vznikol vzťah. A oni to práve dnes chcú oficiálne oznámiť. Podarí sa oddialiť vyzradenie a problémy, ktoré nad Lászlom visia? A ako dopadne návšteva veľkého šéfa u Zuzany, keď František bojuje s následkami požitia Hot-Dogu z bufetu, ktorý bol 10 mesiacov po záruke?

programme.title: Susedia
programme.sub-title: Komediálny seriál SR (2021).
programme.desc: Olé-namasté: Chlapi sú vyhodení zo spální. Zuzana má po nevydarenej návšteve šéfa v práci “peklo” a László nebude mať ťuťu-muťu, kým sa Gergely s Milkou nerozídu, lebo to tajil! Zúfalý László ich nahovorí, aby pred Ildikó zahrali scénku akože sa rozchádzajú. Zámienkou je údajná aféra Gergelyho s Martou Sladkou. Fero v snahe pomôcť intervenuje u Farkašovej, ktorá sa vraj pozná so Zuzaniným šéfom. Ako to dopadne, keď Farkašová je jeho bývalou manželkou? A čo sa stane, keď sa začnú šíriť zvesti o Sladkej s Gergelym a Marta stále randí súčasne so španielskym učiteľom flamenca aj indickým masérom?

programme.title: Partička
programme.sub-title: Záruka najlepšej zábavy
programme.desc: Petra Polnišová, Lukáš Latinák, Marián Miezga, Robo Jakab a Roman Pomajbo sú absolútni profesionáli, ktorí bez väčších problémov - hoc aj o polnoci, poslepiačky či pospiatky - zahrajú... V podstate úplne čokoľvek! A presne o to v medzičasom už kultovej zábavnej šou Partička ide - nenechať sa zaskočiť hocako absurdne znejúcim zadaním diabolského moderátora Dana Dangla a na veľkú radosť divákov v štúdiu i pred obrazovkami improvizovať ako o život! To, že ide o kráľovsky zábavný test invenčnosti a talentu všetkých zúčastnených, ale aj poriadny záber na ich nervy, napnuté na prasknutie, hádam ani netreba zvlášť zdôrazňovať. Nik si totiž nemôže byť istý tým, čo sa stane a ako celý večer dopadne, ani len oni sami nie!

programme.title: Varte s nami
programme.desc: Recepty šéfkuchára Marcela Ihnačáka a známej moderátorky a skúsenej pekárky Adriany Polákovej

programme.title: Svokra
programme.sub-title: Gizela Oňová pomáha rodinám, ktoré sa ocitli v ťažkostiach
programme.desc: Katka vychováva svojho malého syna Huga sama, pretože ich jeho otec opustil. Branislav má však Huga rád, no Katka nevie na čom je a chcela by získať späť Braňove srdce.

programme.title: Susedia
programme.sub-title: Komediálny seriál SR (2021).
programme.desc: Vtípky: František s Lászlóom sa dohodnú, že urobia nachytávky na svoje manželky. László prinesie zo škôlky cudzie dieťa a bude tvrdiť, že to je ich vlastná dcéra. František vybaví pre Zuzanu falošného kupca na zubné pasty. Milka s Gergejom sa stále pokúšajú o dieťa. Gergej sa ráno ponáhľa do Viedne, ale Milka chce, aby spolu počkali na výsledok bejbytestu. Dohodnú sa, že ho schová a pozrú si ho až večer spolu. Ostane na stole v kuchyni. Zuzana sa vyberá na stretnutie s kupcom až do Brezna. Doktor Vojtíšek chce chlapom vynahradiť dovolenku, ktorú si s Andrejkou užili na Floride. Potrebuje nafukovací bazén, ktorý László s Františkom hľadajú v Milkinom byte. Budú mať chlapi odvahu dorobením druhej čiarky na bejbyteste nachytať aj Milku? Ako zamotá nachytávky krásna kuriérka? A podarí sa dievčatám pomstiť sa chlapom za pomoci spravodajstva Televíznych novín?

programme.title: Kuchyňa
programme.sub-title: Komediálny seriál SR (2017).
programme.desc: Mladý talentovaný kuchár z Bratislavy Michal (Samo Spišák) po nešťastnej prezentácii na internete, ktorú nechtiac spôsobil Čeky (Marián Čekovský), príde o prácu v hlavnom meste a odchádza na Liptov. Čeky tam vlastní slovenskú kolibu, ktorú vedie bývalá televízna hviezda, slávny český šéfkuchár Zdeněk (Martin Dejdar). Michal chce začať nový život, ale stretáva sa s neočakávanými prekážkami: šikanovaním zo strany šéfa, posmeškami zo strany kolegov, nepriateľstvom manažérky Lucie (Gabriela Marcinková), s ktorou strávi hneď prvú noc po príchode, žiarlivosťou čašníka Janka (Jakub Gogál) a neskrývaným obdivom čašníčky Aničky (Silvia Holečková). Do toho celý tím pripravuje večeru pre nenávideného konkurenta Kočandera (Richard Stanke) a Michal chce predviesť svoje kuchárske umenie... Michal (Samuel Spišák), je mladý a talentovaný kuchár, ktorý rozbieha svoju kariéru v exkluzívnej bratislavskej reštaurácii. Na dôležitej akcii spôsobí trapas, a tak je nútený odísť. Typický mestský chalan sa odrazu ocitá v prostredí, ktoré ani nemohlo byť odlišnejšie od toho, na čo bol predtým zvyknutý. Šéfkuchár Zdeněk (Martin Dejdar) vedie skutočne výbornú reštauráciu so slovenskými špecialitami a Michal dostane šancu znova sa postaviť do kuchyne. Nové miesto mu prinieslo kolegov, akých by na bývalom mieste nikdy nemal - celebritného majiteľa, bývalého hviezdneho kuchára, ktorý prišiel o kariéru kvôli problémom s alkoholom a niekoľkým rozvodom, ale aj niekdajšiu hokejovú hviezdu, ktorá dnes namiesto puku naháňa zemiaky po panvici. Michal sa ocitne v hľadáčiku manažérky Lucie (Gabriela Marcinková). Pre mladú a krásnu ženu je chalan z hlavného mesta šancou na nový život po rozchode so ženatým milencom. Množstvo humorných situácií prinesú nielen zamestnanci a hostia reštaurácie, ale aj súperenie s konkurenčným podnikom.

programme.title: Susedské prípady
programme.sub-title: Seriál SR
programme.desc: Nový začiatok: Dávid je spisovateľ, ktorý pod pseudonymom Petronela píše ženské romány. Súka ich jeden za druhým a čím viac ich napíše, tým menej je so sebou spokojný, čo sa prejavuje neurotickými až cholerickými reakciami. A to najmä v čase blížiaceho sa termínu odovzdania práce...

programme.title: Chlapi neplačú II
programme.sub-title: Rodinný seriál SR (2014).
programme.desc: Paľko je nahnevaný na Paulu s Michalom, chcel by, aby sa dala dokopy radšej s Viktorom. Nora stojí pred veľkou dilemou. Ak podplatí nového vyšetrovateľa, spolu s Romanovým prípadom zastaví aj Michalove stíhanie.

programme.title: V mene zákona
programme.sub-title: Krimiseriál SR
programme.desc: Krimiseriál SR

programme.title: Rodinné prípady
programme.sub-title: Seriál SR
programme.desc: Tajomstvo: Tomáš a Silvia žijú spolu už takmer devätnásť rokov v pokojnom manželstve a spoločne vychovávajú sedemnásťročného syna Davida. Jeho kamarát však jedného dňa zistí, že Tomáš sa tajne stretáva s mladým dievčaťom...

programme.title: Susedské prípady
programme.sub-title: Seriál SR
programme.desc: Neprispôsobiví: Manželia Mankoveckí sa prisťahovali do hlavného mesta kvôli zhoršujúcemu sa zdravotnému stavu Aleninej matky. S kúpou bytu sa poponáhľali, no vôbec netušili, koho budú mať v dome za susedov...

programme.title: Rodinné prípady
programme.sub-title: Seriál SR
programme.desc: Stratený: Manželia Dušan a Júlia sú vo zväzku druhý raz - ich prvé vzťahy poznačili nešťastné udalosti. Dušanova prvá manželka tragicky zahynula a zanechala mu malého syna. Júliin manžel záhadne zmizol ešte pred narodením dcéry. Jedného dňa však niekto z minulosti nečakane zasiahne do ich životov...

programme.title: Reflex
programme.sub-title: Ľudia - príbehy - emócie
programme.desc: Ľudia - príbehy - emócie

programme.title: Chlapi neplačú II
programme.sub-title: Rodinný seriál SR (2014).
programme.desc: Michal Viktorovi zachráni život. Paľko v strachu o Viktora pripisuje vinu Michalovi a vykričí mu, že sa mal namiesto Viktora zraniť on. Biba chce prekvapiť Borisa v kancelárii, no miesto neho tam nájde polonahú Eriku.

programme.title: Tvoja tvár znie povedome
programme.desc: Veľkolepá zábavná šou plná fenomenálnych premien, skvelých hudobných čísel a obľúbených slovenských hviezd v roliach svetových, ale aj domácich ikon populárnej hudby, je na konci. V siedmej sérii sa divákom opäť predstavila skvelá osmička osobností slovenského šoubiznisu. Svoje herecké, spevácke a tanečné schopnosti, ale v neposlednom rade aj zmysel pre humor, predviedli obľúbené herečky z markizáckych seriálových hitov – Viki Ráková zo Susedov, Lívia Bielovič z Druhej šance a Natália Puklušová z Oteckov, ktoré doplnila populárna stand-up komička Simona Salátová. Mužskú štvoricu súťažiacich tvoril víťaz ostatnej SuperStar Adam Pavlovčin, známy hudobník a famózny huslista Ondrej Kandráč, talentovaný herec a spevák Matúš Kolárovský, ktorý sa dostal do povedomia divákov v úspešnom seriáli Pán profesor, a napokon ďalší mladý herec Karol Tóth, ktorého diváci spoznali aj ako lekára v druhej sérii obľúbeného seriálu Druhá šanca. Na súťažiacich sa aj vo finále pozrie a ich výkony bude hodnotiť herečka Zuzana Kubovčíková Šebová, spevák kapely Desmod Mário „Kuly“ Kollár, hudobník Marián Čekovský a bojovník MMA Attila Végh. Moderuje Martin Nikodým.

programme.title: Partička
programme.sub-title: Záruka najlepšej zábavy
programme.desc: Petra Polnišová, Lukáš Latinák, Marián Miezga, Robo Jakab a Roman Pomajbo sú absolútni profesionáli, ktorí bez väčších problémov - hoc aj o polnoci, poslepiačky či pospiatky - zahrajú... To, že ide o kráľovsky zábavný test invenčnosti a talentu všetkých zúčastnených, ale aj poriadny záber na ich nervy, napnuté na prasknutie, hádam ani netreba zvlášť zdôrazňovať. Nik si totiž nemôže byť istý tým, čo sa stane a ako celý večer dopadne, ani len oni sami nie!

programme.sub-title: Talkshow Adely Banášovej
programme.desc: Talkshow Adely Banášovej

programme.sub-title: Gizela Oňová pomáha rodinám, ktoré sa ocitli v ťažkostiach
programme.desc: Katka vychováva svojho malého syna Huga sama, pretože ich jeho otec opustil. Branislav má však Huga rád, no Katka nevie na čom je a chcela by získať späť Braňove srdce.

programme.title: Susedské prípady
programme.sub-title: Seriál SR
programme.desc: Neprispôsobiví: Manželia Mankoveckí sa prisťahovali do hlavného mesta kvôli zhoršujúcemu sa zdravotnému stavu Aleninej matky. S kúpou bytu sa poponáhľali, no vôbec netušili, koho budú mať v dome za susedov...

programme.title: Rodinné prípady
programme.sub-title: Seriál SR
programme.desc: Nehoda: Karol pracuje ako manažér nadnárodnej firmy a často cestuje. Jeho žene je ľúto, že musí odísť aj dnes večer, keď má narodeniny. Dana nechápe, že si nemôže aspoň v tento deň vziať voľno. Ešte v ten večer im zmizne spred paneláku auto, nájde sa pri dopravnej nehode za mestom. Podozrivý je Karol, ten však tvrdí, že s tým nemá nič spoločné.

programme.title: Rodinné prípady
programme.sub-title: Seriál SR
programme.desc: Pravda alebo odvaha: Bohdan a Elena sú úplne odlišné povahy. Kým Elena je poriadkumilovná a zodpovedná, Bohdan je umelec. Elena však postupom času zisťuje, že Bohdan pred ňou niečo tají a neustále sa zapletá do klamstiev. Rozhodne sa, že za každú cenu vypátra pravdu.

programme.title: Lions & Hyenas
programme.desc: The filmmaker sheds light on the long-standing rivalry between lions and hyenas in hunting and how they survive the wilderness.

programme.title: Wild Fighters (2)
programme.desc: The Fight for Family. Family is everything, at least to a good number of animals; many species live in families, clans or groups; the survival of each individual depends on the family, and the family depends on the union of all its components.

programme.title: Animal Babies: First Year on Earth (3)
programme.desc: New Frontiers. Baby animals approach the end of their first year of life, branching away from their mothers and exploring the world on their own.

programme.title: Wild Latam (5)
programme.desc: The Infinite Plains: Columbia. An enormous territory of endless plains that changes its appearance twice a year, some times appearing flooded, other times looking nearly desiccated; a place of highly contrasting landscapes; the capybara.

programme.title: Wild Latam (6)
programme.desc: The Caribbean: Mexico, Costa Rica, Panama. A wild, jungle world lives on the shores of the Caribbean Sea; within the various channels of the tropical rivers, alligators and crocodiles swim and the fearsome jaguar searches for turtles on the region's virgin beaches.

programme.title: Hope for Wildlife IX (10)
programme.desc: For the Moment. The staff steps up to release the few remaining patients, when Hope suffers a personal tragedy.

programme.title: A Park for All Seasons II (2)
programme.desc: Gwaii Haanas. Some of the most lush and remote landscapes on the continent are preserved in the Gwaii Haanas National Park Reserve.

programme.title: A Park for All Seasons II (3)
programme.desc: Waterton. Waterton National Park's location makes it one of the best spots on earth to spot wildlife.

programme.title: Hope for Wildlife X (1)
programme.sub-title: Frozen Hope. The rehab is flooded with orphaned seals, with some frozen solid in ice.
programme.desc: Frozen Hope. The rehab is flooded with orphaned seals, with some frozen solid in ice.

programme.title: Great Blue Wild (5)
programme.desc: Roatan. Home to the world's second-largest barrier reef, Roatan is one of the world's top dive spots - known for its rare black corals, low-lying nurse sharks and fearsome-looking barracuda.

programme.title: A Park for All Seasons II (4)
programme.desc: Wapusk. One of the world's largest polar bear denning sites hosts both tundra and marine environments.

programme.title: A Park for All Seasons II (5)
programme.desc: Nahanni. Visitors to Nahanni National Park can see striking waterfalls, mountain peaks and canyons.

programme.title: Hope for Wildlife VIII (6)
programme.desc: Baby Boom is Here. The baby boom has officially begun, but Hope's barn isn't complete so the team must come up with a new plan to accommodate all the new arrivals.

programme.title: Hope for Wildlife VIII (7)
programme.desc: A Safe Harbour. Two harbour seals arrive in the middle of the night; Hope's vulture shows sign of progress; an old friend joins the team.

programme.title: Hope for Wildlife X (1)
programme.sub-title: Frozen Hope. The rehab is flooded with orphaned seals, with some frozen solid in ice.

programme.desc: Roatan. Home to the world's second-largest barrier reef, Roatan is one of the world's top dive spots - known for its rare black corals, low-lying nurse sharks and fearsome-looking barracuda.

programme.title: Guardians of the Wild III (1)
programme.desc: Mission Black Rhino. Two black rhinos in Zambia are at the core of a relocation mission that's part of a grand plan to save the species.

programme.title: Guardians of the Wild III (2)
programme.desc: Carnivore Rescue. In Kafue National Park, a team of biologists and vets from the Zambian Carnivore Programme, races to save and protect Africa's apex predators.

programme.title: Hope for Wildlife IV (8)
programme.desc: Windy City Hope. Hope fights a problem that kills millions of birds each year in Chicago.

programme.title: Lions & Hyenas

programme.title: Mighty Mike
programme.desc: Mike, a refined pug with sophisticated tastes, longs for a quiet life but is instead forced to defend his house from a bunch of furry intruders. Raccoons, turtles and Fluffy the Cat have a knack for showing up at the worst possible moments, dragging Mike into a series of unforeseen twists and turns! After his owners return, an exhausted Mike finds himself in the dog house once again, missing yet another opportunity to impress Cindy, the neighbor's elegant dog.

programme.title: Grizzy and The Lemmings II
programme.desc: In a vast natural reserve lost in the middle of the untamed wilderness, there is a small haven of human civilization: the forest ranger's house. Because he is (from his point of view) the most evolved animal on earth, the bear Grizzy feels it's only natural that the ranger's house becomes his territory as soon as its owner is away. No other animal dares to contest this "bear's privilege" except the most inoffensive, stupid and ridiculous mammal family that exists: the Lemmings - who also move into the house as soon as the ranger is gone. Grizzy and the Lemmings lead a merciless battle over the house in an atmosphere of total madness, where the two adversaries constantly try to outdo each other with nasty tricks!

programme.title: Batwheels
programme.desc: Batwheels, a preschool animated action-adventure comedy series starring the most heroic and iconic vehicles from the DC universe. They are a team of incredible crimefighters who have banded together to oppose evil, combat crime and clean up the streets of Gotham City. They are...okay, they're NOT Batman and Robin. They're the Batwheels - an awesome group of sentient super-powered crime-fighting vehicles defending Gotham City alongside Batman, Robin, Batgirl and a host of DC Super Heroes. Having just been created by the Batcomputer, our heroes are essentially kids with little to no life experience. Led by Bam (The Batmobile), the Batwheels - Bibi (The Batgirl Cycle), Red (The Redbird), Jett (The Batwing) and Buff (The Bat Truck) - must navigate the growing pains of being a newly formed super team as well as the growing pains that come with just being a kid.

programme.title: Meet the Batwheels

programme.title: Alice & Lewis II
programme.desc: Double Teatime in Wonderland. Jealous of the King of Frostaland, who is celebrating Alice’s “non-birthday,” the Queen organizes a double-teatime at the castle and forces all her subjects to attend. Alice and Lewis try to enjoy both celebrations. But there’s no denying it: it’s way more chill at the King’s party than the Queen’s, where the poor guests are subjected to fear and intimidation! In fact, it’s so bad that before long, the Queen’s guests start defecting, migrating to the more fun venue in Frostaland. Alice and Lewis try to avoid a crisis by making sure the Queen doesn’t find out they’re having fun behind her back…

programme.title: Alice & Lewis II
programme.desc: Dodson's Predictions. In order to escape punishment, Dodson kids the Queen into believing he is able to read the future. Falling for his story, Queen names him “Great Fortune-Telling Dodo” and invites him to live in the castle. Dodson milks it, using his influence over the monarch to fulfill all his desires, even if it means relieving poor Lewis of his clockmaster duties! Luckily, Alice runs to her rabbit friend’s rescue. But how are they going to prove to the Queen that Dodson doesn’t actually have a single power and that he’s merely using her for his own benefit?!

programme.title: The Mr. Bean...
programme.desc: Dinner for two. Mr. Bean forgets the golden rule: never fall asleep in the bath when you've got a chicken in the oven. So what romantic meal can he quickly rustle-up for his luckless girlfriend, Irma Gobb? The cheese from the mousetrap? The flower from the vase? A meal is eventually provided by an uninvited guest.

programme.title: The Mr. Bean...
programme.desc: The Ball. The nasty tennis player is big and angry and wants his ball back. The one Mr. Bean managed to throw on the roof of a house across the road. Paralysed with vertigo sixty feet up on a windowsill, he is eventually brought to earth by the helpful intervention of a neighbour’s pet gerbil.

programme.title: The Mr. Bean...
programme.desc: Toothache. Bean’s sweet tooth leads him to despair when he bites off a bit more than he can chew. He is tormented by the toothache from Hell - and embarks on a hilarious mission to pull out this menace. Bean’s DIY attempts fail to succeed, and he is left with no other choice but to visit the dreaded dentist. But can Bean brave the Dentist’s chair? Or will the dentist despair when faced with Bean’s antics?

programme.title: The Mr. Bean...
programme.desc: Haircut. After (accidentally) rescuing a kitten from a tree Mr. Bean is set to have his picture in the newspaper! The photographer arrives with the grateful lady cat owner, the scene is set, smiles all round…but then disaster strikes when Bean is continually upstaged by… his hair.

programme.title: CoComelon
programme.desc: Welcome CoComelon! In CoComelon, Baby JJ and his family go on fun every-day experiences packed with things to learn and explore. There is always something new to learn in these everyday situations which any pre-schooler can relate to!

programme.title: Interstellar Ella
programme.desc: Commander Slippy. The gang is playing tag the Meteoroid when Glitch fails to follow Slippy's instruction. He soon realises it's because Glitch saw the comet he's been tracking for months! Slippy is excited - he gets to tag a comet!

programme.title: Interstellar Ella
programme.desc: Earthbound Priya. Ella and Slippy are perfecting their triple corkscrews when Priya, Ella’s best friend from Earth, surprises her with a visit. Priya performs a perfect triple corkscrew to everyone’s amazement. Ella is frustrated that she still can’t nail it

programme.title: Interstellar Ella
programme.desc: Palladium Quest. When a friendly game accidentally breaks Maggie, Ella and co set out to find a rare metal to help fix her. But it’s a metal so rare it’s only in asteroids! After a few unsuccessful attempts, they realize the knowledge Maggie gave them before she broke could help save the day!

programme.title: Interstellar Ella
programme.desc: Friendship Supernova. Slippy wants to watch an eclipse so badly that he makes special safety goggles for himself and his friends. But Ella has a different plan. When she insists on going to watch a binary star supernova, Slippy opts out and heads off on his own.

programme.title: Bugs Bunny Builders: Hard Hat Time
programme.desc: Bugs Bunny Builders is a fun and exciting preschool series featuring your favorite Looney Tunes working at a construction company. Join Bugs Bunny, Lola Bunny, Daffy Duck, Porky Pig and Tweety Bird as they use their amazing vehicles to take on the looniest builds ever. Along the way, they’ll learn valuable lessons and never give up because The Looney Builders always get the job done!

programme.title: Bugs Bunny Builders
programme.desc: At ACME Construction Company, Bugs Bunny and Lola Bunny manage a crew of builders that, quite frankly, should not be anywhere near a construction site. However, by working together as a team, Daffy Duck, Porky Pig, Tweety and others use their tools and wild vehicles to pull off some of the looniest construction jobs ever.

programme.title: The Tom and...
programme.desc: Novel Idea. An overflowing trash bin filled with crumpled paper can mean only one thing…Tom is writing a novel - it's a mystery novel, of course! Tom soon realizes his book is playing out in real life (including the femme fatale who has taken an interest in the feline Mikey Spillane). At first, Tom has fun crafting his own fate, but soon realizes no matter how hard he tries to rewrite his story, he gets deeper and deeper into trouble. Jerry begins to suspect the alley cat, Butch, is up to no good – in the end, Jerry figures out Butch was retrieving Tom's discarded writing from the trash and using it to his advantage!

programme.title: The Tom and...
programme.desc: Cat Match Fever. Butch is bobbing for apple cores when he spots a dolled up Toodles heading his way! Butch slicks back his hair with some lard and strikes a pose. But she walks right past the alley cat. Meanwhile, inside the house, Tom spots Toodles headed in his direction. After a quick spruce up, Tom opens the door only to watch her walk right past the house. Tom slumps. Turns out Toodles is headed to Winston's house. Yep, who knew the two were a match made in kitty heaven (or at least that's what the catmatch app said). Tom and Butch both set out to win Toodles affection while Jerry plays Cyrano to Winston to help him get over his nerves.

programme.title: The Tom and...
programme.desc: Fish Out of Water. Hildie and Beatie return from the Ol' Time Goblin Fair with kettle corn, a giant stuffed warlock, and a piranha they won in the ball toss. Despite their warning not to touch the fish, Tom can't pass up a chance to eat the catch of the day! But first he has to get past Jerry who is determined to protect his new friend. When a failed attempt by Tom ends up with the fish bowl being shattered, Jerry quickly casts a spell with the wand that allows the fish to breathe on dry land! The liberated fish is excited to explore his newfound freedom (walking on his tail fin) and ends up making life a lot more complicated for Jerry who's trying to protect him!

programme.title: The Tom and...
programme.desc: Someone's in the Kitchen with Mynah. Ginger brings home a new pet—a mynah bird who can mimic anyone and anything. Rick complains about the money they will have to spend to feed and care for another pet. Spike and Tom are on notice, as somebody's got to go.

programme.title: The Tom and...
programme.desc: When You Leash Expect It. Ginger decides she wants to teach Tom to walk on a leash to ensure he gets much-needed exercise. Tom hates the leash and does not want to go for a walk. Finally, they're on their way, much to Tom's chagrin. Back home, Jerry and Tuffy proceed to raid the fridge.

programme.title: The Tom and...
programme.desc: Don't Cut the Cheese. It's that special time of year when the Lady of the House's rare, exotic (and very stinky) cheese gets delivered to the manor. It's up to Tom to make sure not a crumb of this cheese—known to be a favorite of mice—goes missing.

programme.title: Thomas & Friends - Shorts XXV
programme.sub-title: Red Light, Green Light
programme.desc: Red Light, Green Light

programme.title: The Mr. Bean...
programme.desc: The Big TV. Irma Gobb comes round to watch TV and Bean finds that liking different programmes to your girlfriend can be very bad for a relationship. After an explosive argument the TV blows up, forcing Mr. Bean to invent his own very ingenious form of home entertainment.

programme.title: The Mr. Bean...
programme.desc: Keyboard Capers. Determined to master Beethoven’s symphony, Mr Bean wangles himself a grand piano, a music book, a candelabra and a very patient piano teacher. Liberace, eat your heart out!

programme.title: The Mr. Bean...
programme.desc: A Running Battle. It's the start of a Fun Run. Mr. Bean lines-up beside his deadly enemy: the fat bloke who stole his parking space. Fun Run or no, nothing will stop Bean beating this man to the finishing post, even if he has to flag a cab.

programme.title: The Mr. Bean...
programme.desc: Egg & Bean. Mr. Bean gets in a flap when a monster turns up in his cake-mix. The good news, though, is that the monster turns out to be a harmless baby bird. The bad news is that it grows into a huge stork and takes over his home. Bean attempts to return it to the wild, and finds teaching it to fly makes his arms ache.

programme.title: Bugs Bunny Builders: Hard Hat Time

Along the way, they’ll learn valuable lessons and never give up because The Looney Builders always get the job done!

programme.title: Alice & Lewis II
programme.desc: The "Werewolf Cactus". Lewis gets a shock when he wakes up one morning and sees all his carrots have been gobbled up overnight! To get to the bottom of it, Alice and Lewis call on the Police Card. Our two heroes accuse Dodson right off the bat: he seems to be the perfect suspect! But then discover the true culprit: a cactus that transforms into a “werewolf cactus” when night falls! And Alice and Lewis are in for a big surprise when they find out who is behind this famished creature!

programme.title: Alice & Lewis II
programme.desc: The Spirit of Adventure. Lewis is at the end of his rope: the Twins have set up home in his yard and have left the Cutie-Twees to their own devices, letting them wreak havoc in the poor rabbit’s house! Alice devises a stratagem to restore Twee Di and Twee Dum’s taste for adventure and travel. But little does she know they’re still recovering from their last expedition, which went seriously south!

programme.title: Interstellar Ella
programme.desc: For the Win. Ella’s mom is a hall of fame Enceladus 500 race champion, and Ella wants to be just like her! She plans to skate, scooter race and geyser jump her way to a championship trophy!

programme.title: Interstellar Ella
programme.desc: Highs and Lows. Ella and Slippy have been practicing their rock-climbing skills, so that they can tackle the recently formed, huge crater on Saturn’s moon, Enceladus. Ella, however, prefers relying on her space boots to get her to the top of the rock wall

programme.title: Bugs Bunny Builders
programme.desc: At ACME Construction Company, Bugs Bunny and Lola Bunny manage a crew of builders that, quite frankly, should not be anywhere near a construction site. However, by working together as a team, Daffy Duck, Porky Pig, Tweety and others use their tools and wild vehicles to pull off some of the looniest construction jobs ever.

programme.title: Bugs Bunny Builders

programme.title: Bugs Bunny Builders: Hard Hat Time
programme.desc: Bugs Bunny Builders is a fun and exciting preschool series featuring your favorite Looney Tunes working at a construction company. Join Bugs Bunny, Lola Bunny, Daffy Duck, Porky Pig and Tweety Bird as they use their amazing vehicles to take on the looniest builds ever. Along the way, they’ll learn valuable lessons and never give up because The Looney Builders always get the job done!

programme.title: The Tom and...
programme.desc: The iconic cat and mouse rivals are back. The all-new series takes another look at the madcap slapstick and never-ending battle that has made Tom and Jerry two of the most beloved characters of all time.

programme.title: The Tom and...
programme.desc: The Old Gray Hair. After discovering a gray hair, Spikes decides he's too old to be the alpha of the house which sends Tom into full bully mode. Jerry will have to act fast to convince Spike he's still the alpha dog.

programme.title: The Tom and...
programme.desc: The iconic cat and mouse rivals are back. The all-new series takes another look at the madcap slapstick and never-ending battle that has made Tom and Jerry two of the most beloved characters of all time.

programme.title: The Tom and...
programme.desc: (Not) Your Father's Mouse-Stache. It's the battle of the moustaches when Tom accidentally drinks a hair tonic potion left behind by Jerry – and Butch realizes he needs to acquire some facial hair of his own if he is to compete for Toodles and Dollface's attentions.

programme.title: The Tom and...
programme.desc: The iconic cat and mouse rivals are back. The all-new series takes another look at the madcap slapstick and never-ending battle that has made Tom and Jerry two of the most beloved characters of all time.

programme.title: The Tom and...
programme.desc: Ball of Fame. When Tom and Jerry's antics unearth an autographed baseball – a childhood souvenir of Rick's – he warns Tom to keep his paws off it, or else! Tom attempts to obey, but Jerry's got other ideas and the ball gets out of hand. The guys chase the treasured ball all over the neighborhood, recovering it only to lose it again. And again. And again.

programme.title: Grizzy and The Lemmings III
programme.desc: In a vast natural reserve lost in the middle of the untamed wilderness, there is a small haven of human civilization: the forest ranger's house. Because he is (from his point of view) the most evolved animal on earth, the bear Grizzy feels it's only natural that the ranger's house becomes his territory as soon as its owner is away. No other animal dares to contest this "bear's privilege" except the most inoffensive, stupid and ridiculous mammal family that exists: the Lemmings - who also move into the house as soon as the ranger is gone. Grizzy and the Lemmings lead a merciless battle over the house in an atmosphere of total madness, where the two adversaries constantly try to outdo each other with nasty tricks!

programme.title: Interstellar Ella
programme.desc: The Crystal Contingency. Ella and Tilly’s playtime results in the smashing of precious crystals that are part of Mom’s meticulous experiments. Determined to replace them, Ella battles a pulsar and then a super-hot planet before she realizes her sidelined little sister could be a big help!

programme.title: Interstellar Ella
programme.desc: Jupiter's Moons. Slippy’s excited to try out his new Rocket Boosters. He’s so excited that he overloads them and becomes stranded on a dangerous moon with Madhu. It’s up to Ella to jog Madhu’s memory so they can find the right moon and save Slippy!

programme.title: Batwheels
programme.desc: Batwheels, a preschool animated action-adventure comedy series starring the most heroic and iconic vehicles from the DC universe. They are a team of incredible crimefighters who have banded together to oppose evil, combat crime and clean up the streets of Gotham City. They are...okay, they're NOT Batman and Robin. They're the Batwheels - an awesome group of sentient super-powered crime-fighting vehicles defending Gotham City alongside Batman, Robin, Batgirl and a host of DC Super Heroes. Having just been created by the Batcomputer, our heroes are essentially kids with little to no life experience. Led by Bam (The Batmobile), the Batwheels - Bibi (The Batgirl Cycle), Red (The Redbird), Jett (The Batwing) and Buff (The Bat Truck) - must navigate the growing pains of being a newly formed super team as well as the growing pains that come with just being a kid.

programme.title: Meet the Batwheels
programme.sub-title: I’ll Be Your Shelter. A musical tribute to Ace, the super-brave bat-hound!
programme.desc: Batwheels, a preschool animated action-adventure comedy series starring the most heroic and iconic vehicles from the DC universe. programme.title: The Mr. Bean...
programme.desc: SuperMarrow. Mr. Bean finds himself in a race to grow a giant marrow with his next-door neighbour. There’s prize money at stake and a chance to get his photo in the papers. And so, as the competition gets tough, Bean’s gardening techniques become more ingenious, unconventional and desperate.

programme.title: The Mr. Bean...
programme.desc: Bean in Love. He’s got her record, the poster and the T-shirt, so when Mr. Bean’s heart-throb, Roxy, is set to sing in concert at the London Palladium, he sets his sights on the only thing that will make his life complete: her signature in his autograph book. A difficult feat but can love prevail?

programme.title: The Mr. Bean...
programme.desc: Double Trouble. Mr. Bean is over the moon when he meets Mr. Pod because both men have so much in common; same shirt, jacket, trousers and underpants. And to top it all, Pod is Bean’s spitting image! Bean falls to Earth with a bump, though, when his girlfriend, Irma Gobb, finds Mr. Pod much better looking than him.

programme.title: The Mr. Bean...
programme.desc: Home Movie. Mr Bean is unimpressed with a horror movie he sees at the cinema and reckons he can do much better. Bean sets out to create his very own home movie masterpiece –featuring Mrs Wicket Irma and Teddy! The screening in the garden is a huge success but will Mrs Wicket be pleased with her makeover and starring role?

programme.title: Alice & Lewis
programme.desc: Six-year-old Alice has a magical key that leads her to Wonderland. In this “other realm”, she’s met an endearing rabbit, Lewis, and the two have become fast friends – best friends to be exact! Alice loves going to Wonderland and teaming up with Lewis and her other friends, even if it means contending with the whimsical, hot-headed Queen. Each episode entails a visit to Wonderland, where Alice experiences a wacky adventure with Lewis, confronting the crazy, eccentric rules and conventions that reign supreme in this parallel Kingdom. Alice’s adventures always begin in the “real world” where she is faced with a particular situation. Her far-fetched experiences in Wonderland lead her to a positive outcome or gain insight which helps her to resolve this dilemma and thus, at the end of each episode, she returns happily to the real world.

programme.title: Dorothy and the Wizard of Oz II
programme.desc: Following the defeat of the Wicked Witch of the West, Dorothy Gale has been appointed Princess of Emerald City by Queen Ozma. Faced with obstacles at every turn – from flying monkeys to her arch nemesis, Wilhelmina (the Wicked Witch of the West's niece and protégé) – Dorothy bravely tackles her royal duties with her feet firmly planted in her magical ruby slippers.

programme.title: Dorothy and the Wizard of Oz II
programme.desc: Following the defeat of the Wicked Witch of the West, Dorothy Gale has been appointed Princess of Emerald City by Queen Ozma. Faced with obstacles at every turn – from flying monkeys to her arch nemesis, Wilhelmina (the Wicked Witch of the West's niece and protégé) – Dorothy bravely tackles her royal duties with her feet firmly planted in her magical ruby slippers.

programme.title: Dorothy and the Wizard of Oz II

programme.title: Dorothy and the Wizard of Oz II
programme.desc: Following the defeat of the Wicked Witch of the West, Dorothy Gale has been appointed Princess of Emerald City by Queen Ozma. Faced with obstacles at every turn – from flying monkeys to her arch nemesis, Wilhelmina (the Wicked Witch of the West's niece and protégé) – Dorothy bravely tackles her royal duties with her feet firmly planted in her magical ruby slippers.

programme.title: Alice & Lewis II
programme.desc: The Frost Ball. The King of Frostaland invites the Queen to a “frost ball” in his realm. Eager to look good, the Wonderland monarch appoints Lewis to open the ball, and threatens to remove him as clockmaster should he mess up! The poor rabbit must now set about learning the art of “tea-skating,” a kind of ice-skating on teapots! Only problem is, he’s scared of taking the plunge and decides to listen to Dodson’s advice (the dodo’s taken on the role of self-appointed coach) instead of simply trying it out himself. Needless to say, Dodson exploits the situation to get extra special treatment. So Alice steps in, determined to do whatever it takes to bring Lewis to his senses.

programme.title: Alice & Lewis II
programme.desc: The Sleeping King. When the Queen reluctantly takes Charlie to Frostaland so he can take part in the traditional “Cherry-Choc Harvest,” she finds the King fast asleep, due to a blunder committed by Alice. But instead of helping Alice and Lewis find an antidote to break the magic spell he’s under, the monarch throws every monkey wrench she can possibly get her hands on into the works! Truth is: she’s jealous of Charlie’s affection for the King of Frostaland.

programme.title: Alice & Lewis II
programme.desc: Lewis' Shadow. Lewis’ shadow becomes detached when Alice accidentally shuts the door behind her rabbit friend a little too fast! Alice finds it super funny. Lewis, on the other hand, is freaking out: his shadow’s a bit too facetious for his liking, not to mention the fact that Queen has a rule against shadows coming off! Unfortunately, the shadow has a mind of its own and the monarch soon finds out. When Alice and Lewis get grounded because of it, the rabbit blames his shadow. But when the latter comes to their rescue, he realizes he misjudged it. In fact, he actually grows pretty fond of it in the end!

programme.title: Alice & Lewis II
programme.desc: Teatime on the Moon. Following a mess-up by Alice, the Queen shamelessly decides to hold her teatime ritual on the Moon, without asking its permission. During this “incursion,” Alice & Lewis do all they can to keep the satellite and its odd inhabitants (Moon-Cutie-Twees, who clean the moon all year round) from being disturbed. But unfortunately, the Queen gets it into her head to build a “vacation home” on the Moon! There’s only one way to get her out of there: her castle must be invaded!

programme.title: Alice & Lewis II
programme.desc: A Joker for a Queen. Jojo, one of the King of Frostaland’s joker cards, looks on in awe as Queen skillfully guides her procession of cards with a snap of her fingers! When the King responds with his own parade, however, he lets his cards do whatever they please, leaving poor Jojo clueless. This prompts her to decide to leave Frostaland and head off to train in Wonderland, to be part of the Queen’s parade. Noticing how sad the King is to see his joker card go, Alice and Lewis do everything they can to persuade Jojo to return. But in so doing, they too find themselves enrolled alongside the Queen’s cards!

programme.title: Grizzy and The Lemmings
programme.desc: In a vast natural reserve lost in the middle of the untamed wilderness, there is a small haven of human civilization: the forest ranger's house. Because he is (from his point of view) the most evolved animal on earth, the bear Grizzy feels it's only natural that the ranger's house becomes his territory as soon as its owner is away. No other animal dares to contest this 'bear's privilege,' except the most inoffensive, stupid and ridiculous mammal family that exists: the Lemmings - who also move into the house as soon as the ranger is gone. Grizzy and the Lemmings lead a merciless battle over the house in an atmosphere of total madness, where the two adversaries constantly try to outdo each other with nasty tricks!

programme.title: Mighty Mike
programme.desc: Electric Turtles. The turtles are struck by lightning during a storm, turning them into positively charged projectiles zapping everything they touch and setting off all the appliances in the house. Mike gets locked outside by the raccoons who were freezing their little butts off in their lair. By the time Mike gets back inside all hell has broken loose, but Mike might have figured out how he can get rid of the raccoons and de-electrify the turtles at the same time.

programme.title: Mighty Mike
programme.desc: Rescuing Roxanne. Playing with Louise and her doll gives Mike an idea. He decides to stage a rescue mission with the doll from the roof of the Mikkelson's house so he can be a hero and impress Iris. But as he prepares to show Iris that he's a real-life superhero, the racoons arrive and ruin his plans. Mercury falls in love with the doll the minute he lays eyes on it while Freddy sets his sights on her sparkly tiara. Now Mike has a real rescue on his hands, all under Iris's watchful gaze. The stakes couldn't be higher!

programme.title: Mighty Mike
programme.desc: A Sick Trick. The racoons watch Mike enviously as he makes himself comfortable in his living room. If only they could get a piece of that sweet action. Then Freddy has an idea. He crashes into the bay window and pretends to be injured, forcing the Mikkelsens to take him in. Mike sees through the ruse immediately, but if he's going to unmask the scheming raccoon he's going to have to defeat the imposter without getting himself in trouble for fighting the poor "injured" Freddy.

programme.title: Batwheels
programme.desc: Batwheels, a preschool animated action-adventure comedy series starring the most heroic and iconic vehicles from the DC universe. They are a team of incredible crimefighters who have banded together to oppose evil, combat crime and clean up the streets of Gotham City. They are...okay, they're NOT Batman and Robin. They're the Batwheels - an awesome group of sentient super-powered crime-fighting vehicles defending Gotham City alongside Batman, Robin, Batgirl and a host of DC Super Heroes. Having just been created by the Batcomputer, our heroes are essentially kids with little to no life experience. Led by Bam (The Batmobile), the Batwheels - Bibi (The Batgirl Cycle), Red (The Redbird), Jett (The Batwing) and Buff (The Bat Truck) - must navigate the growing pains of being a newly formed super team as well as the growing pains that come with just being a kid.

programme.title: The Mr. Bean...
programme.desc: Chocks Away. When his model aeroplane is blown out of the sky by that of a rival kid, Mr. Bean sets his sights on revenge. Next day, his newly constructed fighter plane, almost ready for take-off, sadly lacks a vital part – and the blinking model shop is shut! No matter. It’s chocks away with Teddy at the controls, fighting for airspace over London N10.

programme.title: The Mr. Bean...
programme.desc: Royal Bean. When Mr. Bean breaks his favourite Royal mug he discovers there's only one place to buy a replacement: Buckingham Palace, home of the Queen of England. When one of Her Majesty's corgis runs off with his teddy, Bean gives chase through secret tunnels… and gets lost.

programme.title: The Mr. Bean...
programme.desc: Young Bean. When did Mr. Bean first meet his teddy bear? Did he really learn to drive his mini at the age of ten? Could he possibly have known his battle-axe of a landlady when she was a sweet and blushing bride? Bean takes us on a journey into the past, answering these questions and giving us an inkling as to what made him the man he is today.

programme.title: The Mr. Bean...
programme.desc: In the pink. Mr. Bean finds himself lumbered with an unwanted pet in the form of a four-legged ball of pink fur with piggy eyes and a penchant for earthworms. Encyclopedias leave him none the wiser as to the identity of the pesky creature but Bean can’t bring himself to just abandon it. The puzzle is eventually solved after a picnic in the park and a raid on the local pet shop.

programme.title: CoComelon
programme.sub-title: Finger Family. Sing along with the whole family in this familiar, fun song!
programme.desc: Welcome CoComelon! In CoComelon, Baby JJ and his family go on fun every-day experiences packed with things to learn and explore. There is always something new to learn in these everyday situations which any pre-schooler can relate to!

programme.title: Interstellar Ella
programme.desc: Maggie 2.0. When a botched update causes Maggie to reboot as “Magz”, a super fun party animal, Ella, Slippy and Madhu are excited! At least until “Magz” excessive ways put them all in danger! Now, our gang have to figure out how to get Maggie 1.0 back, pronto!

programme.title: Interstellar Ella
programme.desc: Interstellar Message. When a probe arrives from Madhu’s sibling, our gang sets off to find something amazingly special to send back! But despite their incredible adventure to obtain some super cool moon water - Madhu realizes the most special “thing” they have isn’t a thing at all...

programme.title: Interstellar Ella
programme.desc: Constellation Prize. Slippy’s attempts to impress his cousins with constellation drawings goes awry, causing them to get lost in a nebula! As the nebula messes with their racers and gadgets, escape becomes hopeless. It’s up to Ella and Madhu to find a way to guide them safely back home!

programme.title: Interstellar Ella
programme.desc: Space Junk. When Space Junk smashes into their clubhouse, Ella and Slippy set off to fix the problem. While Ella wants to be rid of the junk, Slippy’s determined to reuse or at least recycle it. When Ella is trapped, re-using space junk may be the only way to save her!

programme.title: Bugs Bunny Builders: Hard Hat Time
programme.desc: Bugs Bunny Builders is a fun and exciting preschool series featuring your favorite Looney Tunes working at a construction company. Join Bugs Bunny, Lola Bunny, Daffy Duck, Porky Pig and Tweety Bird as they use their amazing vehicles to take on the looniest builds ever. Along the way, they’ll learn valuable lessons and never give up because The Looney Builders always get the job done!

programme.title: Bugs Bunny Builders
programme.desc: At ACME Construction Company, Bugs Bunny and Lola Bunny manage a crew of builders that, quite frankly, should not be anywhere near a construction site. However, by working together as a team, Daffy Duck, Porky Pig, Tweety and others use their tools and wild vehicles to pull off some of the looniest construction jobs ever.

programme.title: Grizzy and The Lemmings
programme.desc: In a vast natural reserve lost in the middle of the untamed wilderness, there is a small haven of human civilization: the forest ranger's house. Because he is (from his point of view) the most evolved animal on earth, the bear Grizzy feels it's only natural that the ranger's house becomes his territory as soon as its owner is away. No other animal dares to contest this 'bear's privilege,' except the most inoffensive, stupid and ridiculous mammal family that exists: the Lemmings - who also move into the house as soon as the ranger is gone. Grizzy and the Lemmings lead a merciless battle over the house in an atmosphere of total madness, where the two adversaries constantly try to outdo each other with nasty tricks!

programme.title: The Tom and...
programme.desc: Going Going Gone Viral. When Rick uploads a video of Tom getting his head stuck in Jerry's mouse hole, the video instantly goes viral and Tom becomes the laughing stock of the feline community. Now Tom must restore his reputation by catching Jerry and capturing it all on video. Easier said than done.

programme.title: The Tom and...
programme.desc: School of Hard Knocks. Like a big brother, Jerry gets a sleepy Tuffy out of bed, makes them both breakfast, gets Tuffy cleaned up, puts on his backpack and scoots him past the mean ol' cat to the house next door where WINSTON waits, greeting his students, a gaggle of mice, including Jerry. They each hand their kindly teacher a treat as they take their seats on little spools of thread, ready for the start of class. Winston is teaching his students the basics of force and motion, and today they're going on a field trip to see physics in action. They end up at Tom's house where Tom bears the brunt of the school load until he gets a little tutoring himself.

programme.title: The Tom and...
programme.desc: Brain Food. Waffles is worried that his roommate Bo had his brain eaten by aliens, leaving him a zombie dog. Turns out he's not the first dog in his neighborhood to wake up stupid. Afraid of becoming the next Bo, Waffles hires the Cat and Mouse Detectives to put a stop to this alien invasion. Our Narrator thinks all of this extraterrestrial talk is a load of sci-fi hooey but not our detectives; they're covering all their bases and taking every necessary precaution. Turns out the dog's behavior has more to do with a tainted bag of kibble than visitors from another planet… or does it?

programme.title: The Tom and...
programme.desc: Cold Snap. Wanting to cool off from the blistering heat, Tom and Jerry use a little magic to make it snow, turning the witches' world into a haunted winter wonderland with an evil snowman, haunted snow forts and magic snowball fights. Now they have to figure out how to make it stop snowing.

programme.title: The Tom and...
programme.desc: The Tortoise Don't Play Fair. When a Hare loses to a Tortoise in the biggest race of the year, he comes to Tom and Jerry claiming foul play. It's up to the duo to see what's really behind the most famous race in history.

programme.title: The Tom and...
programme.desc: Wish Bone. Butch finds a wish bone in the garbage and dupes Tom into believing that it will make his wishes come true. Butch trades Tom the bone for a dozen cans of cat food. The alley cat thinks he's pulled off the best scam ever UNTIL Tom's wishes start coming true (from Jerry getting his just dessert to Toodles paying an unexpected visit)! Now Butch will stop at nothing to get that bone back!

programme.title: Thomas & Friends - Shorts XXV
programme.sub-title: Hay, Now!
programme.desc: Hay, Now!

programme.title: The Mr. Bean...
programme.desc: Hot Date. Against his better judgement, Bean has agreed to go out on a proper date with Irma Gobb, his girlfriend. She has the perfect evening planned: a romantic film followed by a candlelit dinner for two. If only she had the perfect boyfriend to go with it.

programme.title: The Mr. Bean...
programme.desc: Wanted. Mistaken for an escaped convict, Bean is carted off to jail where he finds that, with a little imagination, prison can be quite nice actually. The real convict finds life less cosy under the thumb of Mr. Bean’s landlady.

programme.title: The Mr. Bean...
programme.desc: Gadget Kid. Mr. Bean finds himself dogged by a young Japanese boy at the Science Museum. He takes an instant dislike to the Scallywag until he sees what the kid has in his backpack: gadgets so cool you can’t even get them in the West. So when a security guard tries to ruin their fun they run away together to... Mars!

programme.title: The Mr. Bean...
programme.desc: The Visitor. Mr. Bean cannot, for the life of him, place the face of the uninvited fat bloke on his doorstep. An old school photograph and school cap just about jog his memory. By this time his new ‘friend’ has put his feet up and is eating Bean out of house and home. This blast from the past proves to be a blasted pain in the neck.

programme.title: Bugs Bunny Builders: Hard Hat Time
programme.desc: Bugs Bunny Builders is a fun and exciting preschool series featuring your favorite Looney Tunes working at a construction company. Join Bugs Bunny, Lola Bunny, Daffy Duck, Porky Pig and Tweety Bird as they use their amazing vehicles to take on the looniest builds ever. Along the way, they’ll learn valuable lessons and never give up because The Looney Builders always get the job done!

programme.title: Alice & Lewis II
programme.desc: Double Teatime in Wonderland. Jealous of the King of Frostaland, who is celebrating Alice’s “non-birthday,” the Queen organizes a double-teatime at the castle and forces all her subjects to attend. Alice and Lewis try to enjoy both celebrations. But there’s no denying it: it’s way more chill at the King’s party than the Queen’s, where the poor guests are subjected to fear and intimidation! In fact, it’s so bad that before long, the Queen’s guests start defecting, migrating to the more fun venue in Frostaland. Alice and Lewis try to avoid a crisis by making sure the Queen doesn’t find out they’re having fun behind her back…

programme.title: Alice & Lewis II
programme.desc: Dodson's Predictions. In order to escape punishment, Dodson kids the Queen into believing he is able to read the future. Falling for his story, Queen names him “Great Fortune-Telling Dodo” and invites him to live in the castle. Dodson milks it, using his influence over the monarch to fulfill all his desires, even if it means relieving poor Lewis of his clockmaster duties! Luckily, Alice runs to her rabbit friend’s rescue. But how are they going to prove to the Queen that Dodson doesn’t actually have a single power and that he’s merely using her for his own benefit?!

programme.title: Interstellar Ella
programme.desc: That's so Madhu. Madhu has special presents for Ella and Slippy, to celebrate the anniversary of the day they met. But when Ella and Slippy say they can’t hang out, Madhu is sent off with only Maggie for company

programme.title: Interstellar Ella
programme.desc: Ghost Story. Slippy has heard a rumour that the abandoned outpost the gang plans to visit is haunted so he brings his ghost detector goggles, just in case! Ella assures him that there are no such things as ghosts, but then odd things begin to happen.

programme.title: Bugs Bunny Builders

However, by working together as a team, Daffy Duck, Porky Pig, Tweety and others use their tools and wild vehicles to pull off some of the looniest construction jobs ever.

programme.title: The Tom and...
programme.desc: Hip Replacement. The neighbor's cat turns out to be a hipster whose laidback attitudes and behaviors are soon adopted by Tom and the other alley cats. Annoyed, Jerry decides to put an end to all of their silly nonsense.

programme.title: The Tom and...
programme.desc: The iconic cat and mouse rivals are back. The all-new series takes another look at the madcap slapstick and never-ending battle that has made Tom and Jerry two of the most beloved characters of all time.

programme.title: Interstellar Ella
programme.desc: Interstellar Treasure Hunter. Dad gives Ella and Slippy a mysterious Treasure Map of their solar system. When Ella cuts corners as soon as she realizes where the final step is! But when that doesn’t yield them the treasure, she must learn to follow instructions. All of them...

programme.title: Interstellar Ella
programme.desc: Speed of Ella. Ella’s super excited to check out the Orion flare stars with her family. She’s been looking forward to it for weeks. But when Madhu asks a favour and Slippy calls her for help, Ella can’t say no and might miss the festival entirely! Can she use science to get there in time?

programme.title: Batwheels
programme.desc: Batwheels, a preschool animated action-adventure comedy series starring the most heroic and iconic vehicles from the DC universe. They are a team of incredible crimefighters who have banded together to oppose evil, combat crime and clean up the streets of Gotham City. They are...okay, they're NOT Batman and Robin. They're the Batwheels - an awesome group of sentient super-powered crime-fighting vehicles defending Gotham City alongside Batman, Robin, Batgirl and a host of DC Super Heroes. Having just been created by the Batcomputer, our heroes are essentially kids with little to no life experience. Led by Bam (The Batmobile), the Batwheels - Bibi (The Batgirl Cycle), Red (The Redbird), Jett (The Batwing) and Buff (The Bat Truck) - must navigate the growing pains of being a newly formed super team as well as the growing pains that come with just being a kid.

programme.title: Meet the Batwheels
programme.sub-title: Bat Surfin'. Surf-riding musical mayhem with Batman, Robin, and the Batwheels!

programme.title: The Mr. Bean...
programme.desc: Egg & Bean. Mr. Bean gets in a flap when a monster turns up in his cake-mix. The good news, though, is that the monster turns out to be a harmless baby bird. The bad news is that it grows into a huge stork and takes over his home. Bean attempts to return it to the wild, and finds teaching it to fly makes his arms ache.

programme.title: The Mr. Bean...
programme.desc: Hopping Mad! When the frogspawn in Mr. Bean’s bath hatch out, it’s the last thing his landlady needs, especially when she’s invited the Mayor for tea. Hundreds of angry amphibians decide to invite themselves as well. Bean proves to be no expert at catching slippery green things that won’t stop hopping about all over the blinking place.

programme.title: The Mr. Bean...
programme.desc: A Grand Invitation. Mr. Bean meets an aristocratic old lady when he nearly runs over her lapdog with his mini. He’s thrilled to be invited for luncheon at her grand but strangely shabby mansion. Bean is determined to rise to the occasion. He’s so busy with matters of protocol he doesn’t notice that the lady and her sinister butler aren’t quite what they seem…

programme.title: The Mr. Bean...
programme.desc: A Royal Make-over. How does one choose tasteful wallpaper these days? After watching a royal documentary on TV, Mr. Bean decides to decorate his room in the style of Buckingham Palace. If the Queen’s new wallpaper is good enough for Her Royal Highness, then it’s going to be good enough for him. Meanwhile, his landlady, Mrs. Wicket, suffers from illusions of grandeur and crowns herself Queen of the street.

programme.title: Thomas & Friends - Shorts XXV
programme.sub-title: Crystal Cavern
programme.desc: Crystal Cavern

programme.title: Grizzy and The Lemmings II
programme.desc: In a vast natural reserve lost in the middle of the untamed wilderness, there is a small haven of human civilization: the forest ranger's house. Because he is (from his point of view) the most evolved animal on earth, the bear Grizzy feels it's only natural that the ranger's house becomes his territory as soon as its owner is away. No other animal dares to contest this "bear's privilege" except the most inoffensive, stupid and ridiculous mammal family that exists: the Lemmings - who also move into the house as soon as the ranger is gone. Grizzy and the Lemmings lead a merciless battle over the house in an atmosphere of total madness, where the two adversaries constantly try to outdo each other with nasty tricks!

programme.title: Alice & Lewis
programme.desc: Six-year-old Alice has a magical key that leads her to Wonderland. In this “other realm”, she’s met an endearing rabbit, Lewis, and the two have become fast friends – best friends to be exact! Alice loves going to Wonderland and teaming up with Lewis and her other friends, even if it means contending with the whimsical, hot-headed Queen. Each episode entails a visit to Wonderland, where Alice experiences a wacky adventure with Lewis, confronting the crazy, eccentric rules and conventions that reign supreme in this parallel Kingdom. Alice’s adventures always begin in the “real world” where she is faced with a particular situation. Her far-fetched experiences in Wonderland lead her to a positive outcome or gain insight which helps her to resolve this dilemma and thus, at the end of each episode, she returns happily to the real world.

programme.title: Dorothy and the Wizard of Oz II
programme.desc: Following the defeat of the Wicked Witch of the West, Dorothy Gale has been appointed Princess of Emerald City by Queen Ozma. Faced with obstacles at every turn – from flying monkeys to her arch nemesis, Wilhelmina (the Wicked Witch of the West's niece and protégé) – Dorothy bravely tackles her royal duties with her feet firmly planted in her magical ruby slippers.

programme.title: Mighty Mike
programme.desc: Mike, a refined pug with sophisticated tastes, longs for a quiet life but is instead forced to defend his house from a bunch of furry intruders. Raccoons, turtles and Fluffy the Cat have a knack for showing up at the worst possible moments, dragging Mike into a series of unforeseen twists and turns! After his owners return, an exhausted Mike finds himself in the dog house once again, missing yet another opportunity to impress Cindy, the neighbor's elegant dog.

programme.title: Alice & Lewis II
programme.desc: Snow Queen. Alice and Lewis make a "snow-woman" in the Queen’s likeness. But, miffed at not bearing a very strong resemblance to the original, she heads off to meet her model. Our two heroes are scared: their mockery is about to be discovered! But surprise surprise!: the Queen is anything but offended! In fact, she takes the snow-woman under her wing, even going so far as to appoint her her deputy! Unfortunately for Alice and Lewis, this icy substitute becomes just as moody as the Queen: now they’re going to have to do all they can to remind her who she truly is!

programme.title: Alice & Lewis II
programme.desc: The Blue Door Mystery. Queen is seething: her QueenMobile has broken down on the other side of Wonderland and she hasn’t found any blue doors to get her back home. So she commissions Alice and Lewis to draw up a map of all the blue doors in the Kingdom. The mission turns out to be more complicated than expected when our heroes realize the doors in question are VERY FIDGETY!

programme.title: Alice & Lewis II
programme.desc: Trainee Book-Wizards. Before heading off on a trip to find new seeds, the Book-Wizard entrusts his garden to his new apprentices, Alice and Lewis. But it’s a pretty stressful experience: besides having to tend to the garden, they also have to answer the Twins when they come to ask for advice, and entertain the Queen when she decides to turn up unannounced, for teatime! And when Charlie gets whisked away by a bird-book, it’s panic-stations for the two apprentices. In fact, things get so out of hand that they have to call the Book-Wizard to the rescue!

programme.title: Alice & Lewis II
programme.desc: Heel! What a disaster!: the Queen’s favorite booties have gone missing! And if Alice and Lewis don’t find them, they’re going to have to shine all fifty-thirteen other pairs of shoes in her majesty’s possession! Hot on the heels of the mischievous boots, our two heroes must use clever tactics to persuade them to get back to the Queen’s feet!

programme.title: Alice & Lewis II
programme.desc: Too Young. When Alice and Lewis go to the Valley of the Night to look for MooMoo wool, they run into Queen and Charlie. When the little prince asks if he can go with the girl and her rabbit friend, the Queen begrudgingly agrees, and orders the two friends to take good care of her nephew. Charlie is ecstatic to be able to go on a “big boy’s adventure!” But is brought down to Earth with a bang when he finds out his aunt has been following them on the quiet. Feeling betrayed, he decides to run away.

programme.title: Grizzy and The Lemmings
programme.desc: In a vast natural reserve lost in the middle of the untamed wilderness, there is a small haven of human civilization: the forest ranger's house. Because he is (from his point of view) the most evolved animal on earth, the bear Grizzy feels it's only natural that the ranger's house becomes his territory as soon as its owner is away. No other animal dares to contest this 'bear's privilege,' except the most inoffensive, stupid and ridiculous mammal family that exists: the Lemmings - who also move into the house as soon as the ranger is gone. Grizzy and the Lemmings lead a merciless battle over the house in an atmosphere of total madness, where the two adversaries constantly try to outdo each other with nasty tricks!

After his owners return, an exhausted Mike finds himself in the dog house once again, missing yet another opportunity to impress Cindy, the neighbor's elegant dog.

programme.title: Grizzy and The Lemmings II
programme.desc: In a vast natural reserve lost in the middle of the untamed wilderness, there is a small haven of human civilization: the forest ranger's house. Because he is (from his point of view) the most evolved animal on earth, the bear Grizzy feels it's only natural that the ranger's house becomes his territory as soon as its owner is away. No other animal dares to contest this "bear's privilege" except the most inoffensive, stupid and ridiculous mammal family that exists: the Lemmings - who also move into the house as soon as the ranger is gone. Grizzy and the Lemmings lead a merciless battle over the house in an atmosphere of total madness, where the two adversaries constantly try to outdo each other with nasty tricks!

programme.title: Batwheels
programme.desc: Batwheels, a preschool animated action-adventure comedy series starring the most heroic and iconic vehicles from the DC universe. They are a team of incredible crimefighters who have banded together to oppose evil, combat crime and clean up the streets of Gotham City. They are...okay, they're NOT Batman and Robin. They're the Batwheels - an awesome group of sentient super-powered crime-fighting vehicles defending Gotham City alongside Batman, Robin, Batgirl and a host of DC Super Heroes. Having just been created by the Batcomputer, our heroes are essentially kids with little to no life experience. Led by Bam (The Batmobile), the Batwheels - Bibi (The Batgirl Cycle), Red (The Redbird), Jett (The Batwing) and Buff (The Bat Truck) - must navigate the growing pains of being a newly formed super team as well as the growing pains that come with just being a kid.

programme.title: Meet the Batwheels
